verses.verse: Come <S%H3212><s%>, and let us <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; for he hath <S%H2963>torn<s%>, and he will <S%H7495>heal<s%> <S%H5221>us<s%>; he hath smitten, and he will bind us <S%H2280>up<s%>.
After two <S%H3117>days<s%> will he <S%H2421>revive<s%> <S%H7992>us<s%>: on the third <S%H3117>day<s%> he will raise us <S%H6965>up<s%>, and we shall <S%H2421>live<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.

And let us <S%H3045>know<s%>, let us <S%H7291>follow<s%> on to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: his going <S%H4161>forth<s%> is <S%H3559>sure<s%> as the <S%H7837>morning<s%>; and he will <S%H935>come<s%> unto us as the <S%H1653>rain<s%>, as the <S%H4456>latter<s%> <S%H3384>rain<s%> that watereth the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

O <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, what shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H3063>thee<s%>? O Judah, what shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H2617>thee<s%>? for your goodness is as a <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6051>cloud<s%>, and as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> that goeth <S%H7925>early<s%> <S%H1980>away<s%>.

Therefore have I <S%H2672>hewed<s%> them by the <S%H5030>prophets<s%>; I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> them by the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> are as the <S%H216>light<s%> that goeth <S%H3318>forth<s%>.
For I <S%H2654>desire<s%> <S%H2617>goodness<s%>, and not <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%>; and the <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> more than <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>.
But they like <S%H120>Adam<s%> have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>: there have they dealt treacherously against <S%H898>me<s%>.
Gilead <S%H1568><s%> is a <S%H7151>city<s%> of them that <S%H6466>work<s%> <S%H205>iniquity<s%>; it is <S%H6121>stained<s%> with <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

And as <S%H1416>troops<s%> of robbers <S%H2442>wait<s%> for a <S%H376>man<s%>, so the <S%H2267>company<s%> of <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H7523>murder<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> toward <S%H7926>Shechem<s%>; <S%H6213>yea<s%>, they have committed <S%H2154>lewdness<s%>.

In the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a horrible <S%H8186>thing<s%>: there <S%H2184>whoredom<s%> is found in <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>.
Also <S%H3063><s%>, O Judah, there is a <S%H7105>harvest<s%> <S%H7896>appointed<s%> for <S%H7725>thee<s%>, when I bring back the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%>.
